Cookbook

Source: vignettes/articles/Cookbook.Rmd
Cookbook.Rmd
library(rpigpior)

This cookbook shows how to use sensors and drivers using tools provided by rpigpior.

BME280

explain the bme280

using i2c (not spi)

rpi_i2c_get(chip_address = 0x77, data_address= 0xD0) returns the BME Chip ID, 0x60.

 
library(rpigpior)

getTemperature <- TRUE # ask BME280 for temperature?
getPressure <- TRUE # ask BME280 for barometric pressure?
getHumidity <- TRUE # ask BME280 for humidity?

# locations of registers on the BME280
control_measure_address <- 0xf4
control_press_temp <- strtoi("00000001", base = 2)

if (getHumidity) {
  control_hum_address <- 0xf2
  sample_hum <- 0x01
  
  rpi_i2c_set(
    chip_address = 0x77,
    data_address = control_hum_address,
    value = sample_hum,
    data_size = "b"
  )
}

# We always need temperature reading to compensate pressure & humidity
# This turns on temperature reading
control_press_temp <- bitwOr(control_press_temp,
                             strtoi("00100000", base = 2))

if (getPressure) {
  control_press_temp <- bitwOr(control_press_temp,
                               strtoi("00000100", base = 2))
}

# tell BME280 to sense the requested temp/press/humidy
rpi_i2c_set(
  chip_address = 0x77,
  data_address = control_measure_address,
  value = control_press_temp,
  data_size = "b"
)

# Raw temperature data (16-bit signed integer)
raw_temperature <- rpi_i2c_get(chip_address = 0x77,
                               data_address = 0xfa,
                               data_size = "w")

# Calibration coefficients
dig_T1 <- rpi_i2c_get(chip_address = 0x77,
                      data_address = 0x88,
                      data_size = "w")
dig_T2 <- rpi_i2c_get(chip_address = 0x77,
                      data_address = 0x8A,
                      data_size = "w")

# Temperature compensation
var1 <- (raw_temperature / 16384 - dig_T1 / 1024) * dig_T2
var2 <- ((raw_temperature / 131072 - dig_T1 / 8192) ^ 2) * dig_T2
t_fine <- var1 + var2

if (getTemperature) {
  # Calculate temperature in degrees Celsius
  temperature_celsius <- (t_fine / 5120)
}

if (getPressure) {
  # Raw pressure data (20-bit unsigned integer)
  raw_pressure <- rpi_i2c_get(
    chip_address = 0x77,
    data_address = 0xf7,
    data_size = "w"
  )
  
  # convert raw pressure to Pa
  # Calibration coefficients
  
  dig_P1 <- rpi_i2c_get(
    chip_address = 0x77,
    data_address = 0x8E,
    data_size = "w"
  )
  
  dig_P2 <- rpi_i2c_get(
    chip_address = 0x77,
    data_address = 0x90,
    data_size = "w"
  )
  
  dig_P3 <- rpi_i2c_get(
    chip_address = 0x77,
    data_address = 0x92,
    data_size = "w"
  )
  
  dig_P4 <- rpi_i2c_get(
    chip_address = 0x77,
    data_address = 0x94,
    data_size = "w"
  )
  
  dig_P5 <- rpi_i2c_get(
    chip_address = 0x77,
    data_address = 0x96,
    data_size = "w"
  )
  
  dig_P6 <- rpi_i2c_get(
    chip_address = 0x77,
    data_address = 0x98,
    data_size = "w"
  )
  
  dig_P7 <- rpi_i2c_get(
    chip_address = 0x77,
    data_address = 0x9A,
    data_size = "w"
  )
  
  dig_P8 <- rpi_i2c_get(
    chip_address = 0x77,
    data_address = 0x9C,
    data_size = "w"
  )
  
  dig_P9 <- rpi_i2c_get(
    chip_address = 0x77,
    data_address = 0x9E,
    data_size = "w"
  )
  
  # Calculate pressure
  var1 <- t_fine / 2 - 64000 # t_fine is calculated by getTemperature
  var2 <- var1 ^ 2 * dig_P6 / 32768
  var2 <- var2 + (var1 * dig_P5) * 2
  var2 <- (var2 / 4) + (dig_P4 * 65536)
  var1 <- (dig_P3 * var1 ^ 2 / 524288 + dig_P2 * var1) / 524288
  var1 <- (1 + var1 / 32768) * dig_P1
  pressure <- 1048576 - raw_pressure
  pressure <- ((pressure - (var2 / 4096)) * 6250) / var1
}

if (getHumidity) {
  # Raw humidity data (16-bit unsigned integer)
  raw_humidity <- rpi_i2c_get(
    chip_address = 0x77,
    data_address = 0xfd,
    data_size = "w"
  )
  
  # humidity to relative humidity
  
  # Calibration coefficients
  
  dig_H1 <- rpi_i2c_get(
    chip_address = 0x77,
    data_address = 0xA1,
    data_size = "b"
  )
  
  dig_H2 <- rpi_i2c_get(
    chip_address = 0x77,
    data_address = 0xE1,
    data_size = "w"
  )
  
  dig_H3 <- rpi_i2c_get(
    chip_address = 0x77,
    data_address = 0xE3,
    data_size = "b"
  )
  
  ??? 0xE4 / 0xE5[3:0]...[11:4] / [3:0]
  dig_H4 <- rpi_i2c_get(
    chip_address = 0x77,
    data_address = 0xE4,
    data_size = "w"
  )
  ??? 0xE5[7:4] / 0xE6...[3:0] / [11:4]
  dig_H5 <- rpi_i2c_get(
    chip_address = 0x77,
    data_address = 0xE5,
    data_size = "w"
  )
  
  dig_H6 <- rpi_i2c_get(
    chip_address = 0x77,
    data_address = 0xE7,
    data_size = "b"
  )
  
  # Calculate humidity
  temp_compensated_humidity <- (t_fine - 76800)
  
  temp_compensated_humidity <-
    (raw_humidity - (dig_H4 * 64 + dig_H5 / 16384 * temp_compensated_humidity)) * (dig_H2 / 65536 * (
      1 + dig_H6 / 67108864 * temp_compensated_humidity * (1 + dig_H3 / 67108864 * temp_compensated_humidity)
    ))
  
  temp_compensated_humidity <-
    temp_compensated_humidity * (1 - dig_H1 * temp_compensated_humidity / 524288)
  
  humidity_percentage <-
    ifelse(temp_compensated_humidity > 100,
           100,
           temp_compensated_humidity)
  
  humidity_percentage <-
    ifelse(humidity_percentage < 0, 0, humidity_percentage)
}

# print humidty_percentage, pressure, temperature_celsius
